PerfectNetExp.abs: heteroauxing 吲哚乙酸heterocercal 歪尾的heterochromatic 包含不同颜色的
...两侧对称的原始正形尾(diphycercal)，在软骨鱼类，脊柱之尾端向背侧屈曲，与此相应，尾鳍之背叶发达，腹叶较小，呈不对称的歪形尾(heterocercal)。及至硬骨鱼类，背叶有所变小，腹叶有所变大，在外形上再次成为背腹对称的正形尾(homocercal)。在鳗与肺鱼中所见到的次.
heterocellular 异型细胞的heterocercal 歪尾形的heterochlamydeous 异形花被的，萼冠异形的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from hetero- 'other' + Greek kerkos 'tail'

means.word_mean: 1. possessing a tail with the upper lobe larger than the lower and with the vertebral column prolonged into the upper lobe
